PenmuxModule.Name: Commander
PenmuxModule.Description: Command launcher module that reads in csv files that have different commands predefined

Option.Name: CommandSearchPath
Option.Description: Path that contains CSV files that holds the command definitions

Option.Name: NoConfirm
Option.Description: Start the command after selection. When enabled you can't edit the command before running

Option.Name: LocalTempPort
Option.Description: Defines a local port to be used for temporary internal tasks

Consumes.Name: SessionDir
Consumes.Description: The final session directory. Can be used by other modules to store data.

Consumes.Name: HttpRootDir
Consumes.Description: Provides the final http server root directory which holds the files. Can be used by other modules to store files
